creditline: Gift of Carolyn Crandall Bremner and family in honor of our grandparents, Dr. Frank and Jennie May Allen
description: dark burgundy velvet border; square blocks each pieced with irregular fabric scraps sewn together with embroidery floss in various stitch types and colors; various fabrics including embroidered and appliqued parasols, fans, teapot, flowers, top hat, butterfly, large blue leaf; at least four fragments of printed ribbons from various events including Grand Masonic Reunion, 1876, and Wisconsin Pharmaceutical Association, 1862; backing of burgundy fabric with inherent pleating
medium: Silk, velvet, printed silk ribbons, silk and cotton thread
title: Crazy quilt
